tokens.definition: מֶגֶד meged, meh'-ghed; from an unused root probably meaning to be eminent; properly, a distinguished thing; hence something valuable, as a product or fruit:—pleasant, precious fruit (thing).
פְּרִי pᵉrîy, per-ee'; from H6509 ; fruit (literally or figuratively):—bough, (first-)fruit(-ful), reward.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: fruit (113x), fruitful (2x), boughs (1x), firstfruits (with H 7225) (1x), reward (1x), fruit thereof (1x).
